name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

spells.description: Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 158 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.
Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 70 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 651 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
